## ConfigurationManager.init() method

A function used to initialize the configuration in memory

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static init(defaultConfig?: LogRightConfig): Result;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  defaultConfig | [LogRightConfig](./log-right.logrightconfig.md) | The default configuration to apply |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Result](./log-right.result.md)

A boolean indicating if the result of the function was successful or not
